The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 September is 302,175 (536.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 September, there were 10,429 new confirmed cases (18.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 August, there were 6,980 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 49% (3449 extra cases).
